title: Did Riot finish revamping the lore yet?
body: I'm not sure if there's anywhere I can find this information. If it's right in front of my face, please tell me where? I read all the lore when I first started playing but I completely forget which lores they revamped already, if they haven't done them all. Can you give me a list of the ones they've revamped, or just let me know if they're done with them all?

replies.body:
Stuff's being worked on but things are far from fixed. Currently you can go the the champion pages of Graves, Gangplank, Twisted Fate, Miss Fortune, Mordekaiser, Kalista, Karthus, Thresh, Hecarim, Kindred, Fiora, Poppy, Illaoi, Shen and Jhin all have lore in the modern style, and you can find the full lores for Taric, Diana, Pantheon, Leona and Aurelion Sol on the Mount Targon site; just search for Mount Targon in google and you'll find it.

Stuff in the near future will be lore updates for the cast of Shurima, that being Amumu, Azir, Cassiopeia, Nasus, Renekton, Rammus, Rek'Sai, Xerath, Sivir, Skarner and Ezreal, as well as updated lores for Bard, Ekko and Tahm Kench. There's also a new champion Taliyah who they put out a story for last week called The Bird and the Branch but she hasn't been revealed, though her lore should show up when she's revealed as it did with Aurelion Sol and Taric. 

Basically things are coming along.

Hey Sharjo you seem the expert. Is that really all the champions they've done so far? Cuz that is a little depressing they've only 20 of 130 champs done. I sort of assumed they were further along by now. 

That and my dislike of a decent sized portion of the new lores just leaves me feel worse off than I did prior to finding out how much they've done.

20 champions are done in the new format but the amount of lore that's actually canon is much greater than that. Just about everything from the start of 2014 till now can pretty safetly be considered canon, and 2013 stuff is also pretty safe. The problem lies in the fact that there are some huge outliers in champions like Jax, Nocturne, Fiddlesticks etc, and in regions like Bandle City. 

Progress isn't quick but there's progress at least; that's how I view things. The Shurima stuff is right around the corner, so that'll bump the number up to 30. Adding the champions who've also been said to be getting long form lore soon either as a fix or for a VGU, Ryze, Yorick, Tahm Kench, Ekko and Bard are there, so we're at 35 at least, meaning we'll have double the amount. As Green said, last year we got 13 fully updated lores and that only started a little over half way through the year. We've got 7 over the last 5 months and 15 on the way, so the pace is picking up somewhat.

Also I'm no expert; I just draw appropriate conclusions from the information that Riot provides on such matters. I'm a herald of information, not an expert on the inner workings of Riot games.

Well those are at least the ones who have the updated new lore format(consisting of a bio+color text)
Other champs also have lores that are considered canon,but they are still written in an old format(like Gnars lore for example,his lore is actually more comparable to a color text).

Anyway at least it seems like they are finally picking up speed,I mean they said that the shurima lores will come soon(likely around taliyahs release within the next weeks),if that is true,then we'll get ~5-10 full lores at once depending on how many shurima lore they'll actually update.

for comparison last year we've got only 12,even if you count the new champs,this year we've got already 7

Pretty much everything from the Freljord event onward in terms of Lore is confirmed to be Canon. More isolated events like Rengar and Kha'Zix's stories are probably still good too. The real issue is that they haven't told us what was kept and what was thrown away on a case by case basis. For example, we weren't sure if all of Zed's stuff 100% still applied until Jhin's color text confirmed it.

Overall though champs that were really hit by the retcon were those whose stories involved the League. Jax, Fiddle and Nocturne are pretty much non-existent at the moment.

They are not finished yet, mostly Demacia and Noxus lore is far from being defined ( and just got some references in other pieces of lore ), plus now we don' t know what are Yordles, since the race as whole seems to have received a bigass rework ( for example now they age much slower) and so we don' t know exactly what happened to Bandle.
I'd say there's more things done that have been left undone. A list would be pretty long, just looking at Sharjo's post, and I don't think that's even all of them.
